title: Bizarre Watch: This Kids' Watch Has Male And Female Genitals Printed On Strap
text:
You don't really need a watch in these days of mobile phones. But still some wear one. But a mother was shocked to see the design on her kids' watch.

While scrolling through the internet for wrist watch, a girl discovered a design that scandalised her poor mother.

The mother soon took a screenshot of the watch with the offensive design and shared it on the largest network for parents in the UK called ‘mumsnet’. She expressed her disbelief at the wristwatch costing 97 pounds (Rs 8,876).

Here's the picture of the watch:

Mumsnet

One could easily spot the male and female genitals on it. Coloured in yellow and pink respectively, the watch drew mixed reactions from everyone on mumsnet. Many tried to reason that the design could be something else, ranging from just dotted designs to swirls to licorice on a closer inspection.

However, people couldn’t understand the design and ended up thinking that it was swirls and lines. There were few who were offended by it while some thought the design was okay.
